meanings.definition: To provide too much education or training to (someone)
meanings.sent1: The school overeducates the students with unnecessary information.
meanings.sent2: She worries that the tutoring center may overeducate her child.
meanings.sent3: The robot overeducates itself by constantly downloading new data.
meanings.sent4: The book club overeducates its members with challenging reads.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit overeducates visitors with detailed historical facts.

meanings.sent1: The teacher overeducates the students by assigning too much homework.
meanings.sent2: Parents fear that the competitive school system may overeducate their children.
meanings.sent3: The enthusiastic chef overeducates his audience with complex cooking techniques.
meanings.sent4: The documentary overeducates viewers with an overload of information.
meanings.sent5: The online course overeducates participants with an abundance of modules.
